statements: DELETE FROM WasteDisposalActivities WHERE location = 'City Park' AND disposal_time < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM WasteDisposalActivities WHERE disposal_time < '2022-01-01' AND location = 'Park' AND quantity > 100;
DELETE FROM waste_disposal_sites WHERE location = 'City Center';
DELETE FROM WasteCollection WHERE waste_type = 'Paper' AND quantity > 100;
DELETE FROM waste_collection_sites WHERE site_name = 'Central Location';
DELETE FROM WasteCollection WHERE collection_id = 101 AND waste_type_id = 5;
DELETE FROM WasteDisposalRoute WHERE start_location = 'City Center' AND end_location = 'Industrial Area';
